subject: Unable to track the order I made on Saturday January 10, 2026
description_text: The tracking number given to me immediately after purchasing pedals does not work and I have not received an email on its status either. Plz help, thank you

conversations.body_text: It has been 31ish hours since my email about not being able to see my purchase or track it on your site.  It has also been 4 days since my purchase. The fund were removed from my bank account to pay you yet I still have not received any correspondence from you.  I am now very concerned about what is going on especially after spending over $400 on your product/services. Ease respond immediately.   I currently have the feeling I have been ripped off and I genuinely hope this is not the case.  Thank you in advance for your rapid response to my request request.
Hi stevecorderman,     We apologize for the inconvenience. I see the order status is currently being processed in the warehouse and should be shipped out to you today.
Thank you very much for the response and proof that my purchase was processed.   I hope you have an amazing day. Take care.
I did receive my order today but of the 2 boxes received,  the happiest for the pedals were not there. I have thoroughly rechecked both boxes too. Please send those as well.  Thank you.
I am also missing the DC power supply for the controller
The haptics for the pedals are missing, not "happiest".

Hi stevecorderman,    Here is your shipping tracking link. This product has been out of stock for nearly two weeks—it's simply too popular. We'll ship it out to you within the next couple of days. We sincerely apologize for the delay.  https://t.17track.net/en#nums=SF6047238969527
